name: OnLevelSelect_14B
_source: speak;Narrator;Myrrh returns safely to Ephraim's side.
speak;Narrator;A noble warrior to the end, Selena fought with great honor, never once using Myrrh as a hostage.
speak;Narrator;Ephraim renews his vow to pierce the veil of mystery surrounding the Grado Empire.
speak;Narrator;Selena is added to the list of innocents who Grado must account for.|The center of the Grado Empire.|Emperor Vigarde should have been here, but...
